name: contractforge
description: ContractForge â€“ contract-driven mocks and test POC

scripts.test:ui: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run test:ui --workspace ui-app --if-present
scripts.check: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm run test:unit
scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n orchestrator,inventory,user,pricing,ui "npm run dev:orchestrator" "npm run dev:inventory" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:pricing" "npm run dev:ui"
scripts.dev:mock:all: npm run pacts:pull && npm run mocks:generate && concurrently -n mocks,orchestrator,ui "npm run mocks:start" "cross-env MOCK_MODE=true npm run dev:orchestrator" "cross-env VITE_MOCK_MODE=true npm run dev --workspace ui-app"
scripts.pact:all: npm run pact:broker:up && npm run pact:broker:health && npm run pact:consumer && npm run pact:verify && npm run pact:broker:down
scripts.mocks:start: concurrently -n inventory,user,pricing "npx @mockoon/cli start --data tools/mockoon/generated/inventory-api.json --port 5001" "npx @mockoon/cli start --data tools/mockoon/generated/user-api.json --port 5002" "npx @mockoon/cli start --data tools/mockoon/generated/pricing-api.json --port 5003"
scripts.mocks:dev: npm run pacts:pull && npm run mocks:generate && npm run mocks:start
